sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import styles from './Testimonial.module.css' import Testicard from '../../Components/Testicard/Testicard' import ayush from '../../Assets/team/ayush.jpg' import Saumya from '../../Assets/team/saumya.jpeg.jpg' const data = [{ name:"Ayush Singh", role:"Senior Data Scientist", img:{ayush}, desc:"", twitter:"", linkedin:"" }, { name:"Saumya Singh", role:"Red Hat", img:"", desc:"", twitter:"", linkedin:"" }, { name:"Aanshul Sadaria", role:"Google", img:"", desc:"", twitter:"", linkedin:"" } ,{ name:"Ajay Suneja", role:"Adidas", img:"", desc:"", twitter:"", linkedin:""} , ] const Testimonial = () => { return (
SAY'S
Experience Our Excellence
Through Testimonials
{data.map((e)=>)}
) } export default Testimonial
